values.name: Play Intro
values.description: Controls whether or not intro plays.

values.name: Star 1
values.description: The first star, obtained by beating the game on Normal Mode.

values.name: Star 2
values.description: The second star, obtained by beating the game on Hard Mode.

values.name: Star 3
values.description: The third star, obtained by beating the game on Hard Mode without dying and without using Animdude.
